byline.original: By HARI KUMAR and ELLEN BARRY

abstract: Indian Army reports three soldiers were killed and one of their bodies mutilated on border with Pakistan; promises retribution for incident.

headline.print_headline: Three Indian Soldiers Are Killed  on Border of India and Pakistan
headline.main: 3 Indian Soldiers Are Killed in Kashmir

snippet: The killings on the border of India and Pakistan occurred amid an unrelenting series of attacks there in recent months....
lead_paragraph: The killings on the border of India and Pakistan occurred amid an unrelenting series of attacks there in recent months.
